channel.title: HTML Vote Code?
channel.description:
I develoing a website thats not rsps realted but its related to RS so i was just wondering if anyone has a code for a vote system?
Eg: a page that says
VOTE Here
Then a button
When they get redirected back to home page it will have the vote count underneath?

item.title: HTML Vote Code?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

You can use HTML for the actual links but you’ll need PHP for the functions, as Ruby said, look for some tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: HTML Vote Code?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Skillz4Milz:

Well im not that good with the web knowlage maybe you could do it for me Ruby? ill send you over my website files via skype? and you can do the vote page etc?

If I wasn’t swamped with university work, I would. Look up some tutorials on using an IPN and working with databases in php.

Read full topic

item.title: HTML Vote Code?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:4, topic:463805”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=567480.msg4123297#msg4123297 date=1350039091]
HTML is just for the foundation, CSS if for presentation, and JS takes care of all the actions that go on in your screen. Firstly you would need to learn how to use the SQL drivers with Java, so you can make it send to a database, to keep track of the players votes, and all that good stuff.
[/quote]

And he’ll just magic the website sided data into the database? Lol.[/quote]
YEP THAT’S TOTALLY WHAT I MEANT BY THAT

Read full topic
